thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: ju'blu.

author: ju'blu.
title: ju'blu.
text:
I made an order for a very small item in Dec. 2016 on banggood.com and then along the way the item took longer (than usual) in arriving.
I contacted the customer care but soon it was clear the item was either lost-in-transit or, delivered at another location(or country). they asked me to exercise patience promising a replacement if the item did not arrive after their promised 'patience' period.
True to their word, they delivered the replacement March 1st 2017.
to me the item looked small/negligible, but good to see they actually delivered on their promise.
